name: Command of the King
description: An avoidable attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of the enemy's max hit as damage. On a hit, inflicts a stack of Laceration, inflicts Blight, applies Fear for ${onHitEffect2turns} turn, inflicts Silence, inflicts Wither, inflicts ${onHitEffect5stacks} stack of Voidburst and applies stun for ${onHitEffect6turns} turn.
descriptionGenerator: An <avoidable> attack that deals <damage> as damage. On a hit, <hitEffect>.

name: Tendril Slam
description: An avoidable attack that deals damage equal to ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your max hit ${hitCount} times over ${duration}s. Heals you for ${lifesteal}% of the damage dealt. On a hit, has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to apply Fear for ${onHitEffect0turns} turn and has a ${onHitEffect1chance}% chance to apply stun for ${onHitEffect1turns} turn.
descriptionGenerator: An <avoidable> attack that deals <damage> damage <count> times over <duration>. Heals <attacker> for <lifesteal> of the damage dealt. On a hit, <hitEffect>.

name: Madness
description: An avoidable attack that deals damage equal to ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your max hit ${hitCount} times over ${duration}s. On a hit, gives the enemy -${onHitEffect1modValue0}% Global Accuracy for ${onHitEffect1turns} of the enemy's turns.
descriptionGenerator: An <avoidable> attack that deals <damage> damage <count> times over <duration>. On a hit, <hitEffect>.

name: Consuming Grasp
description: An avoidable attack that deals damage equal to ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your max hit ${hitCount} times over ${duration}s. Heals you for ${lifesteal}% of the damage dealt. On a hit, has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to apply Fear for ${onHitEffect0turns} turn;has a ${onHitEffect1chance}% chance to inflict a Slow that gives the enemy +${onHitEffect1magnitude}% Attack Interval for ${onHitEffect1turns} of the enemy's turns and gives the enemy -${onHitEffect2modValue0}% Global Accuracy and -${onHitEffect2modValue1}% Global Evasion for ${onHitEffect2turns} of the enemy's turns.
descriptionGenerator: An <avoidable> attack that deals <damage> damage <count> times over <duration>. Heals <attacker> for <lifesteal> of the damage dealt. On a hit, <hitEffect>.

name: Pandemonium
description: An avoidable attack that deals damage equal to ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your max hit ${hitCount} times over ${duration}s. On a hit, has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to apply Fear for ${onHitEffect0turns} turns.
descriptionGenerator: An <avoidable> attack that deals <damage> damage <count> times over <duration>. On a hit, <hitEffect>.

name: Voidfire Volley
description: An avoidable attack that deals damage equal to ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your max hit ${hitCount} times over ${duration}s. On a hit, has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to inflict ${onHitEffect0stacks} stack of Voidburst and gives the enemy -${onHitEffect1modValue0-0}% ${onHitEffect1modResistanceName0-0} for ${onHitEffect1turns} of your turns. Voidburst stacks up to ${onHitEffect0maxStacks} times. Upon reaching maximum stacks, they take damage equal to ${onHitEffect0percent}% of your base max hit.
descriptionGenerator: An <avoidable> attack that deals <damage> damage <count> times over <duration>. On a hit, <hitEffect>. <EffectMechanics>

name: Black Hole
description: An avoidable attack that deals damage equal to ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your max hit ${hitCount} times over ${duration}s. On a hit, has a ${onHitEffect0chance}% chance to inflict ${onHitEffect0stacks} stack of Voidburst, inflicts a Slow that gives the enemy +${onHitEffect1magnitude}% Attack Interval for ${onHitEffect1turns} of the enemy's turns and gives the enemy -${onHitEffect2modValue0-0}% ${onHitEffect2modResistanceName0-0} for ${onHitEffect2turns} of your turns.

name: Null Sphere
description: An avoidable attack that deals damage equal to ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your max hit. On a hit, inflicts ${onHitEffect0stacks} stack of Voidburst, has a ${onHitEffect1chance}% chance to make the enemy unable to apply buffs or modifier effects to themselves for ${onHitEffect1turns} of their turns and gives the enemy -${onHitEffect2modValue0-0}% ${onHitEffect2modResistanceName0-0} for ${onHitEffect2turns} of your turns.

name: Infinite Void
description: An avoidable attack that deals damage equal to ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of your max hit ${hitCount} times over ${duration}s. On a hit, gives the enemy -${onHitEffect0modValue0-0}% ${onHitEffect0modResistanceName0-0} until the end of the fight, has a ${onHitEffect1chance}% chance to inflict ${onHitEffect1stacks} stack of Voidburst and has a ${onHitEffect2chance}% chance to apply stun for ${onHitEffect2turns} turns.

name: Terror Beam
description: An avoidable attack that deals damage equal to ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% of the attacker's max hit ${hitCount} times over ${duration}s. Each hit, there is a 5% chance to apply Burn, Poison, Ablaze, Toxin, Fear, Bleed, Wither, Blight or Voidburst.
